title: Simulation-Based Computer-Assisted Language Learning (CALI) Development Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and experience in mathematics education administration
context.additional_context: Hands-on program to strengthen CALI software development competencies for corporate math education administrators

learning_goals: Learners can design a CALI software prototype applying discovery learning techniques
Learners can construct a language learning content integration system in simulation/VR environments with over 80% completion
Can define CALI software requirements, including a learner-adaptive feedback system
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
